thread.title: Visibly upset Phiyega leaves Parliament after Presidency drops suspension bombshell
thread.title_full: Visibly upset Phiyega leaves Parliament after Presidency drops suspension bombshell | News24

author: news24.com
title: Visibly upset Phiyega leaves Parliament after Presidency drops suspension bombshell
text:
Cape Town - A visibly upset General Riah Phiyega left a meeting in Parliament on Wednesday, minutes after the Presidency announced her suspension as national police commissioner.
Phiyega was in the middle of a meeting to brief Parliamentâ€™s police committee on the South African Police Service.
She walked out of the committee room, leaving her bag behind, and was taken out through the closed off area of Parliament, quickly followed by some of her staff.
This took place after one of her staff members walked over to her and showed her something on a cellphone.
